code:
import { callAPI } from './base'; // Register user

export const registerUser = data => callAPI(`/auth/register`, 'post', data); // Login a user

export const loginUser = data => callAPI(`/auth/login`, 'post', data); // Remind user's password - send a confirmation link

export const remindPassword = data => callAPI(`/auth/remind-password`, 'post', data); // Send user a new password

export const resetPassword = data => callAPI(`/auth/reset-password`, 'post', data);
